text: Miki Yeung (born 14 February 1985) is a Hong Kong cantopop singer and actress. In 2002, she joined the cantopop music idol group Cookies. In 2005, her film b420 was awarded the Grand Prix Award: The 19th Fukuoka Asian Film Festival. Currently she is the TV hostess of the programme Love Academy for the J2 channel. In 2012, she signed an artiste contract with TVB. ==Discography== ===As part of Cookies=== {| class="wikitable" !align-"left"|Album # !align="left" width="250px"|Album Information |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="center"|1st |align="left"|Happy Birthday * Released: April 2002 * Label: EMI Hong Kong |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="center"|2nd |align="left"|Merry Christmas * Release Date: 23 December 2002 * Label: EMI Hong Kong |} ===As part of Mini Cookies=== {| class="wikitable" !align-"left"|Album # !align="left" width="250px"|Album Information |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="center"|3rd |align="left"|All The Best * Released: 13 August 2003 * Label: EMI Hong Kong |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="center"|4th |align="left"|4 Play * Release Date: January 2004 * Label: EMI Hong Kong |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="center"|5th |align="left"|4 in Love * Release Date: 17 December 2004 * Label: EMI Hong Kong |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="center"|6th |align="left"|903 California Red: Eleven Fires Concert(11團火音樂會) * Release Date: October 2004 * Label: EMI Hong Kong |} ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" !align-"left" width="100"|Year !align="left" width="250"|Name !align="left" width="150"|Role |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="center"|2002 |align="left"| Nine Girls and A Ghost 九個女仔一隻鬼 |align="left"| |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="center"|2003 |align="left"| Feel 100% 2003 百分百感覺 2003 |align="left"| Jackie |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |rowspan = "2" align="center"|2004 |align="left"| Dumplings 三更2 餃子 |align="left"| Kate |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |align="left"| Split Second (TV series) 爭分奪秒 |align="left"| Fung Mei Yun |- |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" |rowspan = "2" align="center"|2005 |align="left"| Dragon Reloaded 龍咁威II 之 皇母娘娘呢?
